content: have you tried your hands at making an amigurumi before here is a cute pattern to get you started meet peru the llama the llama is created from 9 pieces body/head 4 legs tail nose 2 ears the llama is made from the bottom up for the eyes we use safety eyes to create the pompoms we use a pompom maker the other material we will need is stuffing the yarn we use is the red heart super saver yarn 100% acrylic medium 4 worsted the color yarns we use are aran and cornmeal the approximate finished measurement of our llama 7 tall from head to legs without ears 4 1/2 wide side to side of the body with stuffing inserted the llama comes in only one size keep in mind if you change the size of the hook it will affect the measurements of your finished amigurumi give it a try and see how yours comes out if you need help with this pattern check out my tutorials how to use a pompom maker https //youtu be/nsxsnvajiw4 si=owap_w4fkou0h_ks peru the llama https //youtu be/hdicjavp6u4 si=wx_pl7x8a9bzlxua
